about_the_game:
Stunt Legends is a blast of colors and adrenaline, high speed and fun with no limits. This car stunt racing game lets you drive high octane number muscle cars.

Explore British countryside roads freely and uncover every mistery of the city. Dive into the bright nature and cover your car with mud of offroad trails.

Drifting, high speed and every sort of stunt are waiting for you, only in this unique and innovative stunt racing game. The realism of details will grab you until you feel the pistons moving in yout bones.

Weekly updates will add new cars and events for unlimited fun in an ever-evolving world.

Explore British countryside roads freely and uncover every mistery of the city. Dive into the bright nature and cover your car with mud of offroad trails.

Drifting, high speed and every sort of stunt are waiting for you, only in this unique and innovative stunt racing game. The realism of details will grab you until you feel the pistons moving in yout bones.

Weekly updates will add new cars and events for unlimited fun in an ever-evolving world.
name: Stunt Legends

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Drift, speed and all sorts of stunts await you in this unique and innovative game. The realism of the details will envelop you until you feel the movement of the pistons in your bones. Stunt Legends is an explosion of colors and adrenaline. Speed and fun with no limits.
